com.communote.server.core.image.type

Class EntityImageManagement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.core.image.type.EntityImageManagement

  • @Service
public class EntityImageManagement
extends Object
    Service for storing and accessing images of entities like users, topics or tags. The images are stored as binary properties.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultImage

        public ImageVO getDefaultImage(EntityImageManagement.ImageType imageType)
        Get the default image
        Parameters:
        imageType - the type of the image
        Returns:
        the default image or null if there is no default image

      • getDefaultImageLastModified

        public Date getDefaultImageLastModified(EntityImageManagement.ImageType imageType)
        Get the date of the last modification of the default image of the given type.
        Parameters:
        imageType - the image type
        Returns:
        the date of the last modification or null if there is no custom default image for the type

      • getImage

        public ImageVO getImage(String entityId,
                        EntityImageManagement.ImageType imageType)
                 throws AuthorizationException
        Get the image of the entity
        Parameters:
        entityId - the ID of the entity
        imageType - the type of the image
        Returns:
        the image or null if there is no custom image for the entity
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user is not allowed to access the image

      • getImageLastModified

        public Date getImageLastModified(String entityId,
                                 EntityImageManagement.ImageType imageType)
                          throws AuthorizationException
        Get the date of the last modification of the custom image of an entity
        Parameters:
        entityId - the ID of the entity
        imageType - the type of the image
        Returns:
        the last modification date or null if the entity has no custom image
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - in case the current user has no read access to the image

      • hasCustomImage

        public boolean hasCustomImage(String entityId,
                              EntityImageManagement.ImageType imageType)
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity.
        imageType - Type of the image.
        Returns:
        True, if this entity has a custom image.

      • hasReadAccess

        public boolean hasReadAccess(String entityId)
        Test whether the current user has read access to the image of the given entity.
        Parameters:
        entityId - the ID of the entity
        Returns:
        true if the user has access, false otherwise

      • setDefault

        public void setDefault(String entityId,
                       EntityImageManagement.ImageType imageType)
                throws AuthorizationException
        Method to reset to default image.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity to reset.
        imageType - Type to reset.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access this.

      • storeImage

        public void storeImage(String entityId,
                       EntityImageManagement.ImageType imageType,
                       byte[] image)
                throws VirusFoundException,
                       VirusScannerException,
                       AuthorizationException,
                       MaxLengthReachedException,
                       NotFoundException
        Method to update an image.
        Parameters:
        entityId - Id of the entity the image is for.
        imageType - The type of the image.
        image - The image to store.
        Throws:
        VirusFoundException - Thrown, when a virus was found.
        VirusScannerException - Thrown, when something with scanning went wrong.
        AuthorizationException - Thrown, when the user is not allowed to access this.
        MaxLengthReachedException - Thrown, when the image is to large.
        NotFoundException - Thrown, when the entity of the image doesn't exists.
